narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Scheila Watson is a Counselor, Addiction (Substance Use Disorder) provider based in Colorado Springs, CO. From 2018-07 through 2019-09, this provider received $213K in Medicaid payments across 3K claims serving 1K beneficiaries, billing 5 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 85% of billing is concentrated in 90837 (90837), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Spending more than doubled from $43K in 2018 to $170K in 2019 (293% growth).
Saw a 3.9× spike in 2019 ($43K → $170K), a sharp year-over-year increase.
Billing stopped in 2019-09, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
